RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_usecaseindex_update MESSAGE-ID zaplink.
TABLES: tadir. TYPE-POOLS: abap.
*TYPES to_synch TYPE REF TO zaplink_raw_data. " to be the first object meet in standalone generator
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_type FOR tadir-object, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA t_list TYPE ygpl_usecaseindex=>tt_compkeys. DATA o_updater TYPE REF TO ygpl_usecaseindex. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <i> LIKE LINE OF o_updater->components.
t_list = ygpl_usecaseindex=>get_keys_from_tadir( srcsystem = s_srcs[] type = s_type[] name = s_name[] packages = s_pack[] ext = p_ext author = s_author[] ).
CREATE OBJECT o_updater.
o_updater->add_keys( t_list ). IF o_updater->components IS INITIAL. WRITE:/ 'Component list is empty or do no contains any program, class or function group'(lie). EXIT. ENDIF.
o_updater->update_index( ).
WRITE:/ 'List of components that usecase indexes have been updated :'(cpl). LOOP AT o_updater->components ASSIGNING <i>. WRITE:/ <i>-object, <i>-objname, <i>-name. ENDLOOP.
END-OF-SELECTION.

ITEM.ENTRY: Component list is empty or do no contains any program, class or function group
ZAPLink : Extract all package to files
ZAPLink : Extraction en masse de componsants
